experience.title: Software Developer

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: • Developed the backend of Growth Application in Python using FastApi Framework and MongoDb Atlas for database management • Worked on clustering of delivery person using DBSCAN algorithm to identify wrong address and developed frontend in ReactJS• Implemented Ray Casting algorithm in python to check whether the delivery location of user is in urban or rural area for delivery
experience.description_html: • Developed the backend of Growth Application in Python using FastApi Framework and MongoDb Atlas for database management • Worked on clustering of delivery person using DBSCAN algorithm to identify wrong address and developed frontend in ReactJS• Implemented Ray Casting algorithm in python to check whether the delivery location of user is in urban or rural area for delivery <!---->

experience.title: SDE
experience.description: •Fabricated a microservice for a discussion and query forum for company employees to enable the seamless exchange of knowledge•Developed backend of the application in Java (Spring Boot Framework), used Gradle build tool and Oracle for database•Created and implemented a data model for storing forum data and used JPA to persist data between the java object and database•Acheived code coverage of 96.0% using Mockito and Jnuit, achieved a score of 87.46% using Zally Linter for Rest API documentation
experience.description_html: •Fabricated a microservice for a discussion and query forum for company employees to enable the seamless exchange of knowledge•Developed backend of the application in Java (Spring Boot Framework), used Gradle build tool and Oracle for database•Created and implemented a data model for storing forum data and used JPA to persist data between the java object and database•Acheived code coverage of 96.0% using Mockito and Jnuit, achieved a score of 87.46% using Zally Linter for Rest API documentation
